info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 19 at 3:34AM AST until September 19 at 6:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected within the next few hours.
* WHERE...Arroyo, Guayama, Maunabo, Patillas and Yabucoa.
* WHEN...Until 600 AM AST.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. Dangerous flows over low-water crossings. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 324 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rainfall from persistent thunderstorms now located over the coastal waters south of southeastern Puerto Rico. These thunderstorms will move slowly inland during the next 1 to 2 hours, bringing periods of heavy rain across the advisory area. Soils across the region are already saturated, with up to 4 inches of rain reported yesterday morning. This will increase the potential for urban and small stream flooding, especially in low-lying areas, roads with poor drainage, and along small creeks and streams. - Rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This rain will result in minor flooding impacts across the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Guayama, Patillas, Arroyo, Maunabo, Yabucoa, Emajagua, Palmas, Playita, Buena Vista, Corazon, Olimpo, Martorell, Jobos, Yaurel, Lamboglia, Palo Seco, Rosa Sanchez, El Negro, Comunas and Candelero Arriba. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AST EARLY THIS MORNING

area.areaDesc: Arroyo, PR; Guayama, PR; Maunabo, PR; Patillas, PR; Yabucoa, PR
